title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Online Mathematical Inquiry: Through Literary Methodology and Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and geometric cognition skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain fraction addition and subtraction concepts with 80% accuracy using literary narrative structures in VR simulations
Learners can creatively apply metaphorical expressions (metaphors) to present three or more problem-solving scenarios for math problems
Learners can collaboratively author math inquiry reports with peer learners using online collaboration tools, experiencing constructivist teaching methods
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
